Keywords.Keep: The card does not go to the discard pile at Cycle.
Keywords.Ephemeral: When played, the card is Forgotten.
Keywords.Bundled: When drawn, draw an additional card.
Keywords.Auto: When drawn, activates without costing mana.
Keywords.Aura: While in hand, grants an ongoing effect.
Keywords.Eternal: Cannot be Discarded or Forgotten; only playable once per turn.
Keywords.Fated: Always starts in your opening hand.
Keywords.Magnetic: When Restocked, automatically moves to your hand.
Keywords.Status: A temporary card that weakens you (e.g., burn, wound, curse).
Keywords.Overwork: Effect activates when the card is Discarded or Forgotten.
Keywords.Needy: When Cycled while in hand, the card is Forgotten.

Buffs.Fortify: Increases Guard or Shield gain by X.
Buffs.Vigilant: Increases Guard or Shield gain by X., Volatile.
Buffs.Pump: Increases attack damage by X, Volatile.
Buffs.Bounce: Returns a X damage to a enemy random then dissapears.
Buffs.Poisoned: Deals X damage at the start of each turn, Diminishing.
Buffs.Diminishing: Drops 1 value at the start of their turn.
Buffs.Volatile: Disappears at the start of their turn.

Mechanics.Guard: Absorbs incoming damage; removed at the start of your next turn.
Mechanics.Shield: Absorbs incoming damage; does not expire (taken after Guard).
Mechanics.Cycle: At the start of your turn, move all cards in hand to the discard pile (triggering Cycle effects), then draw a new hand from the draw pile.
Mechanics.Draw: Draw one or more cards from the draw pile into your hand.
Mechanics.Discard: Move cards from your hand to the discard pile when played or discarded.
Mechanics.Restock: When the draw pile is empty when trying to draw, shuffle the discard pile back into the draw pile.
Mechanics.End Turn: Ends the players turn, triggers enemy turns, then begins the cycle phase.
Mechanics.Scry: Look at the top X cards of your draw pile, choose one to draw, and discard the rest.
